TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FontFunctions extends HarfBuzzSharp.NativeObject

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of callback functions used by HarfBuzz for font operations such as retrieving glyph metrics, advances, and extents.
